thread.title: Lamar County to receive grant for multi-use pathway
thread.title_full: Lamar County to receive grant for multi-use pathway - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Lamar County to receive grant for multi-use pathway
text:
PURVIS, Miss. (AP) - A road project that will widen a section of Old Highway 11 in Lamar County has received additional funding.
The Hattiesburg American reports ( http://hatne.ws/1VAOH0l ) Southern District Transportation Commissioner Tom King presented a $300,000 check to the Board of Supervisors Monday that will allow construction of a bike path/trail running between Old Highway 24 to just beyond the Hattiesburg city limits to the north.
The county had boosted its 2015-16 budget by $400,000 for the widening project, anticipating spending $500,000 for such early stage work as environmental studies, assessment and possible right of way purchases.
Information from: The Hattiesburg American, http://www.hattiesburgamerican.com
